title: ADiya pAdA
sahitya:
ADiya pAdA aruL purivAi aravin shramattil tiruvaDi vaittu ninru


anupallavi

  nADi dEvarum nAnilattil kUDa nAn maraigaL unnaip-pugazhndumE pADa


caraNam    kamala mukhamadil shuruL kuzhal Ada karuNai shurakkum iru karuvizhi Ada
 kAdaNi marakata kuNDalMADa kaNThattil maNangamazh mAlaigaL Ada
 ghana shilambu kazhal konji viLaiyADa kuvalayattOr idaik-kaNDu koNDADa
